ecoPlanet.title: ECO PLANET
ecoPlanet.ecoDesc1: ECO PLANET is a blockchain development company running ESG Financial Project.
ecoPlanet.ecoDesc2: ESG Financial Project developed and operating 2 platforms: ECO DeFi and ECO NFT.
ecoPlanet.ecoDesc3: ECO DeFi is a defi lending platform deployed on BNB Chain, ECO NFT is NFT platform deployed on Ethereum.
ecoPlanet.ecoBox: ECO NFT is NFT marketplace, where part of the profit is donated to Eco organizations for environmental protection campaigns. On the platform users can purchase renewable energy NFTs, environment related content NFTs, and other eco related NFTs.

ourService.title: OUR SERVICE
ourService.sub_title: Check out the services provided by ECO PLANET.
ourService.service1: ECO PLANET provides all the development services required for blockchain business, such as token issuance, wallet development, DEX, DeFi and NFT.
ourService.service2: You can create and onboard Dapps on various mainnets such as Ethereum, Klaytn, BNB, Chain, Solana, and Polygon.
ourService.service3: Planning, development and design are provided for P2E games and other "To Earn" (2E) services.

cirDiagram.enterpriseNFT: Various Enterprise NFTs such as the member ID NFT on the company website as well as the employee NFTs will be issued for organizations. By utilizing NFT for communication with customers for marketing purposes, we ensure sovereignty of customer data and create  ecosystem where companies and customers can coexist.
cirDiagram.brandNFT: Minting NFTs is an essential part for Brand Marketing. Brand value tied to NFTs which can be owned by major customers or being utilized for collaborations. Brand NFTs in the metaverse will have more explosive brand power.
cirDiagram.localTourismNFT: To revitalize local tourism the company provides full package of the blockchain services from consultations to development, issuance and design of the NFT ecosystem.
